alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 5:11PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Charlotte and Lee Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 510 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Southwest Florida Airport, or near Fort Myers. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Bonita Springs, Lehigh Acres, East Dunbar, Matlacha, Palmona Park, Southwest Florida Airport, Harlem Heights, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Iona, Cypress Lake, Pine Island Center, San Carlos Park, McGregor, Pine Manor, Charleston Park, Lovers Key State Park, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores and Olga. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
